text: this is really interesting. It made me realize that one could perform adversarial attacks against AD systems. For example, `f_evil(x)=f(x)+eps(x)*sin(x/(2*eps(x)))` is a function that will always be within 1 ULP of `f(x)` but who's derivative has no relation to `f`
